original_text: Broadcast your identity; required for legal trade.
Reduce sensor profile at the cost of burn level.
Stop and increase detection range, fleet is more detectable.
Briefly boost burn level at the cost of fuel and combat readiness.
Boost burn level at the cost of acceleration and wind-up time.
Slow down another fleet heading towards the source of the pulse.
Pick through a debris field for anything of value.
Detect in-system entities at very long range; unreliable with false readings.
Jump into a system through a nascent gravity well, or directly into hyperspace.
Do a preliminary survey on all nearby planets remotely.
